string-array.name: fun_facts
string-array.item: Ants stretch when they wake up in the morning.
Ostriches can run faster than horses.
The gold medals in the Olympic Games are made of silver.
You were born with 300 bones, but by adulthood have only 206.
It takes about 8 minutes to reach the sunlight to earth.
Some bamboo plants can grow up to a meter a day.
The state of Florida is bigger than England.
Some Penguins can jump 2-3 feet above the water
"On average it takes 66 days to make a new habit."
"Mammoths were following walking on earth at the time that the great pyramids were built. "
